info.name: wayfinder-admin copy

request.description:
Here 8 is a user id

This api is used to update user

email
phone
name
role_id

To delete a role

Here 1 is a role id

must be form data

name      ------->  text
location  ------->  text
malllogo  ------->  png fiel

To dalate mall

1 is a mall id

add only one image 
and imageCount should be 1
Stores are something like predefined stores which has store number and path. The shops are assigned to store.
Need to pass floor-id, store_number and pathfile
need to pass store_id, image_id and pathfile in formdata

API is used to add banners

banner_name
validity
mall_id
bannerimage

Here banner Id is 1


and we are not deleting the data. Just change the status to false.

Here you need to pass formdata
with imageid bannerid and bannerimage file

Here 127 is a image_id and
You need to send image file

Here event filed might be multiple so you need to append multiple times to formdata


and must add count(number of event images)

Here 7 is a image id.

need to pass image count in data
